name: Bouncing Betty (ambientdev)
description:
WASD movement, LMB to shoot, E to interact, hold CTRL to use a health pack, press SPACEBAR to jump.

Look around the map for enemies, kill them and bring HORN to the shuttle. The shuttle leaves every 3 minutes and then pays you CREDITS for the HORN you've given it. The shuttle then lands within the next minute at the point designated by the marker. Hold on to horn to get bounty hunters to spawn in along with normal enemies-killing them gets you CREDITS.

Lot of placeholder sprites and barebones UI.
